name: Amanda Soubeana Lee
pob: Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States
bio: When Amanda Soubeana Lee was born on 24 September 1895, in Red Level, Covington, Alabama, United States, her father, Brinkley Franklin Lee, was 24 and her mother, Luequinnie A Ealum, was 28. She married Amos Chapman Odom on 24 April 1910, in Brooks, Covington, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 3 sons and 4 daughters. She lived in Butler, Alabama, United States in 1935 and Election Precinct 2 Shell, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1940. She died on 24 July 1958, in Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 62, and was buried in Covington, Alabama, United States.
